Line9.1481FF: Fine. Talk to the quartermaster and he will provide compensation.
Line7.148202: For yours maybe. Mine is damn thirsty.
Line5.1481FF: It is bad for the soul.
Line3.148202: The Knights Penitent in Cerrigar destroyed our ale supply. Dumped it right out into the dirt. Said it was bad for the soul.
VoiceDir1.1481FF: Not angry, but just slightly annoyed. Doesn't want to deal with this.
Line1.1481FF: (clears throat) And what is the problem, exactly?
